4.2.3.title: Ensure user's access to the package registry utilizes MFA
4.2.3.description: Enforce Multi Factor Authentication for user access to the package registry.
4.2.3.remediation: For each package registry in use, enforce Multi-Factor Authentication as the only way to authenticate.

4.2.5.title: Ensure anonymous access to artifacts is revoked
4.2.5.remediation: Disable the anonymous access option on every artifact or package manager in use.

4.3.4.title: Ensure webhooks of the package registry are secured
4.3.4.description: Use secured webhooks of the package registry.
4.3.4.remediation: For each webhook in use, change it to secured (over HTTPS).
